name: LD44 - Surgeon Keeper
description:
My life has value and I will not take it anymore!

Here is a game about money, sickness, hospitals, employees, money, stress, poop, sickness,sickness,sickness, and poop.
I had a lot of fun, may try to extend to 24h+,meanwhile here is my sweet little malformed baby-game...
Hope you'll like it :)
